name.firstSourceText: 王玉林 (武汉大学计算机学院 软件工程系 人工智能研究所 ) 姓名： 王玉林 主页： Scroll down on this page to see brief biography. 性别： 男 职称： 教授 (博导) 学历学位： 博士 电话： 68778966 办公地点： E-mail： wangyulinwh ▇ qq.com 请手工替换符号 领域： 多媒体信号处理,计算机视觉,计算机应用,模式识别,数据管理,物联网,信息安全,音视频处理 招生信息： 2018年度招收硕士4名，招收方向：计算机科学与技术(学硕),计算机技术(专硕),软件工程(专硕)。 招收博士0名，招收方向：...请选择...。 Brief Bio. of Prof. Yulin WANG ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Yulin Wang is a full professor in the School of Computer Science, Wuhan University, China. His research interests include image and video processing, digital rights management, information security, intelligent system, e-commerce, IoT, code clone and so on. He got his PhD degree from University of London, UK. He got his master and bachelor degree from Huazhong University of Science and Technology（HUST）and Xi-Dian University respectively, both in China. Before joining the Wuhan University, he has worked in Hi-tech IT industry, including HUAWEI© and national research institute, for more than ten years. He has involved more than 15 national and international research projects. In recently 10 years, Prof. Wang has published 1 book, and 50+ journal and conference papers, including in IEEE TIP. He holds 10 authorized patents. Prof. Wang served as EiC of 2 international journals and reviewer of top IEEE and ACM journals. He also served as reviewer of Innovative talents projects and national research funds, including National High Technology Research and Development Program of China. Prof. Wang was the external PhD advisor of Dublin City University, Ireland during 2008-2010. In recently 10 years, Prof. Wang served as chairman of more than 10 international conferences, and keynote speakers in more than 20 international conferences. Besides UK, he visited US, France,Italy, Portugal,Croatia, Australia, Germany, korea, Ireland,Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, and Hong Kong. In addition, Prof. Wang has been appointed as the deputy director of Hubei provincial science and technology commission (CAPD) since 2014. Contact: E-mail: yulinwang@whu.edu.cn, wangyulinwh@qq.com Skype: halfmooncityuk ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 图像和视频信息处理、机器视觉、信息隐藏、信息安全、物联网技术、代码克隆等。 博士：英国伦敦大学 硕士：华中科技大学 学士：西安电子科技大学 先后就职于军工科研机构、深圳华为技术有限公司、重点大学等。 全英文或双语授课： 博士研究生：专业英语、数字媒介技术前沿 硕士研究生：专业英语、随机信号分析、计算机网络、多媒体技术应用 本科：数字图像处理、数字逻辑电路、C++程序设计、信息安全、信息系统导论、数据库系统、Linux操作系统、数字信号处理、信号与系统、通信原理 近10年， 发表包括在 IEEE TIP内的国际学术期刊和会议论文50多篇。 科技专著1本（Science Press)。 授权发明专利8项。 在国际学术会议上作主题报告(keynote) 20多次。 担任国际学术会议主席(conference chair)10多次。 受聘担任爱尔兰DCU大学外聘PhD supervisor。 近10年，主持包括国家“863”计划课题在内的纵向课题8项。 3位教授，4名副教授 6个博士生 (含 2个外国博士生), 4 名硕士生 军工装备研制贡献奖集体一、二、三等（部级）各1次。 全国政协优秀科技提案三等奖4次。 指导学生参加全国科技竞赛，获得优胜奖2次，三等奖1次。 湖北省科委副主任（民进) 受邀担任2个国际学术期刊主编(EiC)
